Name: Him & Her Collection
About the game: Can you find love among the darkness? Him & Her Collection is a challenging puzzle platformer in which the player must find a way to their significant other by defying gravity between levels. Complete all three titles in this pack; Him & Her, Her Challenges and Him & Her3. Gameplay You can move your character from a side-scrolling perspective, and at any time, you can also jump. However, when not jumping you simply walk towards the platforms and the entire level will rotate according to the direction you are moving the ledges. Features Three games in this version of the collection; More than 100 challenges in all levels of difficulty; Normal and hard difficulty settings; Moody art graphics; A provoked experience;
